divs: Sighting DetailsThe first light is clear, the next light is larger that is orange and it appears to have a tail with a light on the end that flashes red randomly. I noticed because it was bright through my window. Then the light where moving very slowly. I know that they were not stars. They seem too mechanical in movement and the tail on the second one with the flashing red light. This was not a star and they moved slowly across the sky.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Tan Valley
There were no other sightings in San Tan Valley on or around July 7th 2012
Summary: The first light is clear, the next light is larger that is orange and it appears to have a tail with a light on the end that flashes red randomly.
